00055 class block_base;

00064 struct block_header
00065 {
00066     typedef detail::atomic_count count_type;
00067 
00068 #ifndef BOOST_DISABLE_THREADS
00069         static mutex mutex_;
00070 #endif
00071 
00072     count_type count_;                                                          
00073     mutable block_header * redir_;                                      
00075         bool destroy_;                                                                  
00076     intrusive_list::node tag_;                                          
00078     intrusive_list includes_;                                           
00079     intrusive_list elements_;                                           
00081     static fast_pool_allocator<block_header> pool_;
00087     block_header() : count_(1), redir_(this), destroy_(false)
00088     {
00089         includes_.push_back(& tag_);
00090     }
00091 
00092         
00099     bool release()
00100     {
00101         if (-- count_ == 0)
00102         {
00103                         destroy_ = true;
00104                         
00105             for (intrusive_list::iterator<block_base, & block_base::block_tag_> i; i = elements_.begin(), i != elements_.end(); )
00106                 delete &* i;
00107                 
00108                         destroy_ = false;
00109             
00110             for (intrusive_list::iterator<block_header, & block_header::tag_> i = includes_.begin(), j; j = i, i != includes_.end(); i = j)
00111                         { 
00112                                 ++ j;
00113                                 
00114                 if (&* i != this)
00115                     delete &* i;
00116                         }
00117 
00118             return true;
00119         }
00120 
00121         return false;
00122     }
00123 
00124         
00131     block_header * redir() const
00132     {
00133         block_header * p = redir_;
00134         
00135         while (p != p->redir_)
00136                 p = p->redir_;
00137                 
00138         redir_ = p;
00139         
00140         return p;
00141     }
00142         
00143         
00150     void redir(block_header * p)
00151     {
00152         if (redir_ != p)
00153         {
00154             redir_ = p;
00155             redir_->includes_.merge(includes_);
00156             redir_->elements_.merge(elements_);
00157             new (& redir_->count_) count_type(redir_->count_ + count_); 
00158         }
00159     }
00160 
00161         
00169     void * operator new (size_t s)
00170     {
00171         return pool_.allocate(s);
00172     }
00173     
00174         
00183     void * operator new (size_t s, block_header * p)
00184     {
00185         return p;
00186     }
00187 
00188         
00195     void operator delete (void * p)
00196     {
00197         pool_.deallocate(static_cast<block_header *>(p), sizeof(block_header));
00198     }
00199 };

00204 fast_pool_allocator<block_header> block_header::pool_;

00207 #define TEMPLATE_DECL(z, n, text) BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(n) typename T ## n
00208 #define ARGUMENT_DECL(z, n, text) BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(n) T ## n const & t ## n
00209 #define PARAMETER_DECL(z, n, text) BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(n) t ## n
00210 
00211 #define BEFRIEND_MAKE_BLOCK(z, n, text)                                                                                                                                                         \
00212         template <typename V, BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, TEMPLATE_DECL, 0)>                                                                                                 \
00213                 friend block_ptr<V> text(BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, ARGUMENT_DECL, 0));
00214 
00215 #define CONSTRUCT_MAKE_BLOCK(z, n, text)                                                                                                                                                            \
00216         template <typename V, BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, TEMPLATE_DECL, 0)>                                                                                                 \
00217                 block_ptr<V> text(BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, ARGUMENT_DECL, 0))                                                                                                                 \
00218                 {                                                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00219                         return block_ptr<V>(new block<V>(BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, PARAMETER_DECL, 0)));                                                                       \
00220                 }

00229 template <typename T>
00230     class block_ptr : public block_ptr_base<T>
00231     {
00232         template <typename> friend class block_ptr;
00233 
00234         typedef block_ptr_base<T> base;
00235         
00236         using base::share;
00237                 using base::po_;
00238 
00239         union
00240         {
00241             block_header * ps_;                                         
00242             intrusive_stack::node pn_;                          
00243         };
00244 
00245 #ifdef BOOST_BP_RAW_POINTER
00246         public:
00247 #endif
00248 
00254         template <typename V>
00255             block_ptr(block<V> * p) : base(p)
00256             {
00257                 if (! pool::is_from(this))
00258                 {
00259                     ps_ = new block_header();
00260 
00261                     init(p);
00262                 }
00263                 else
00264                 {
00265                     pool::top(this)->ptrs_.push(& pn_);
00266                     pool::top(this)->inits_.merge(p->inits_);
00267                 }
00268             }
00269 
00270                 
00277         template <typename V>
00278             block_ptr & operator = (block<V> * p)
00279             {
00280 #ifndef BOOST_DISABLE_THREADS
00281                         mutex::scoped_lock scoped_lock(block_header::mutex_);
00282 #endif
00283 
00284                 release(false);
00285 
00286                 init(p);
00287 
00288                 base::operator = (p);
00289 
00290                 return * this;
00291             }
00292 
00293         template <typename V>
00294                 void reset(block<V> * p)
00295                 {
00296                     operator = <T>(p);
00297                 }
00298             
00299                 template <typename V>
00300                         friend block_ptr<V> make_block();
00301 
00302                 BOOST_PP_REPEAT_FROM_TO(1, 10, BEFRIEND_MAKE_BLOCK, make_block)
00303 
00304     public:
00305         typedef T                       value_type;
00306         typedef block<value_type>     element_type;
00307 
00308 
00313         block_ptr() : ps_(0)
00314         {
00315             if (! pool::is_from(this))
00316                 ps_ = new block_header();
00317             else
00318                 pool::top(this)->ptrs_.push(& pn_);
00319         }
00320 
00321                 
00328         template <typename V>
00329             block_ptr(block_ptr<V> const & p) : base(p)
00330             {
00331                 if (! pool::is_from(this))
00332                     ps_ = new block_header();
00333                 else
00334                     pool::top(this)->ptrs_.push(& pn_);
00335 
00336                 ps_->redir()->redir(p.ps_->redir());
00337             }
00338 
00339                 
00346                         block_ptr(block_ptr<T> const & p) : base(p)
00347             {
00348                 if (! pool::is_from(this))
00349                     ps_ = new block_header();
00350                 else
00351                     pool::top(this)->ptrs_.push(& pn_);
00352                                 
00353                 ps_->redir()->redir(p.ps_->redir());
00354             }

00363         template <typename V>
00364             block_ptr & operator = (block_ptr<V> const & p)
00365             {
00366 #ifndef BOOST_DISABLE_THREADS
00367                         mutex::scoped_lock scoped_lock(block_header::mutex_);
00368 #endif
00369 
00370                 if (ps_->redir() != p.ps_->redir())
00371                 {
00372                     release(false);
00373                                         
00374                         ps_->redir()->redir(p.ps_->redir());
00375                 }
00376                 base::operator = (p);
00377 
00378                 return * this;
00379             }
00380

00388         block_ptr & operator = (block_ptr<T> const & p)
00389         {
00390             return operator = <T>(p);
00391         }
00392 
00393         void reset()
00394         {
00395 #ifndef BOOST_DISABLE_THREADS
00396                 mutex::scoped_lock scoped_lock(block_header::mutex_);
00397 #endif
00398 
00399             release(false);
00400         }
00401         
00402         template <typename V>
00403                 void reset(block_ptr<V> const & p)
00404                 {
00405                     operator = <T>(p);
00406                 }
00407         
00408         bool cyclic() const
00409         {
00410                 return ps_->redir()->destroy_;
00411         }
00412 
00413         ~block_ptr()
00414         {
00415                         if (cyclic())
00416                                 base::po_ = 0;
00417                         else
00418                                 release(true);
00419         }
00420 
00421     private:
00428         void release(bool d)
00429         {
00430             base::reset();
00431             
00432             if (! pool::is_from(this))
00433             {
00434                         block_header * p = ps_->redir();
00435         
00436                 if (p->release())
00437                     if (! d)
00438                     {
00439                         p->~block_header();
00440                         ps_ = new (p) block_header();
00441                     }
00442                     else
00443                         delete p;
00444                 else 
00445                                         if (! d)
00446                         ps_ = new block_header();
00447             }
00448         }
00449 
00450                 
00457         void init(block_base * p)
00458         {
00459             if (p->init_)
00460                 return;
00461 
00462                 block_header * q = ps_->redir();
00463         
00464                         // iterate memory blocks
00465             for (intrusive_list::iterator<block_base, & block_base::init_tag_> i = p->inits_.begin(); i != p->inits_.end(); ++ i)
00466             {
00467                 i->init_ = true;
00468                 q->elements_.push_back(& i->block_tag_);
00469 
00470                                 // iterate block_ptr elements
00471                 for (intrusive_stack::iterator<block_ptr, & block_ptr::pn_> j = i->ptrs_.begin(), k; k = j, j != i->ptrs_.end(); j = k)
00472                                 {
00473                                         ++ k;
00474                     j->ps_ = ps_;
00475                                 }
00476             }
00477         }
00478 
00479         public:
00480 #if defined(BOOST_HAS_RVALUE_REFS)
00481         block_ptr(block_ptr<T> && p): base(std::move(p.po_)), ps_(std::move(p.ps_))
00482         {
00483         }
00484 
00485         template<class Y>
00486                 block_ptr(block_ptr<Y> && p): base(std::move(p.po_)), ps_(std::move(p.ps_))
00487                 {
00488                 }
00489 
00490         block_ptr<T> & operator = (block_ptr<T> && p)
00491         {
00492                 po_ = std::move(p.po_);
00493                 ps_ = std::move(p.ps_);
00494                 
00495                 return *this;
00496         }
00497 
00498         template<class Y>
00499                 block_ptr & operator = (block_ptr<Y> && p)
00500                 {
00501                         po_ = std::move(p.po_);
00502                         ps_ = std::move(p.ps_);
00503                         
00504                         return *this;
00505                 }
00506 #endif

00509 template <typename V>
00510         block_ptr<V> make_block()
00511         {
00512                 return block_ptr<V>(new block<V>());
00513         }
